* Terms & Conditions

Read More

  • Education

Study in Malaysia

Malaysia offers diverse educational opportunities because of its modern infrastructure and natural beauty. You will get a unique experience and quality education in a culturally diverse environment if you choose to study in Malaysia. Therefore, this is your go-to destination for affordable but high educational standards. Furthermore, you won’t have to strive to obtain a student visa for Malaysia.
Diverse Cultural Mix

Malaysia is one of the liveliest nations in Asia, and that's the reason it's rich in culture, has delicious food, and has amazing infrastructure. You will be able to adapt to the intricate environment of Malaysia, rich in culture but steadfast in innovative advancements. With the friendly nature of Malaysians, you will have the opportunity to explore global insights.

Career Opportunities

Being the hub of the world’s known universities, Malaysia not only provides quality education but also facilitates you with post-study work. Moreover, you can also do a part-time job for 20 hours a week during summer breaks. This means you can enjoy some extra buck to support yourself. Malaysia is also one of the safest counties with effective transportation.

Quality Education

Leaving your home for education and staying in a foreign land is devastating, however, you do something invaluable in return. With global educational standards, Malaysian universities help you shape your future. According to UNESCO’s report, Malaysia is the 11th best destination to study abroad. Its model works on British education system, so the output is same but in low cost.

Navigate Your Path to Malaysia

Understanding Malaysia's student visa requirements are simple, and its government have made the process smooth. With free entry systems, students can take education from different corners of the world. Our smart education consultants in Islamabad are here to guide you, helping you with international applications to get the study visa. We arrange sessions to understand what you need and make the perfect choices for you.

  • Education Consultation

    Get Professional Counselling

  • Admission process

    Support from the Beginning

  • Getting Your Visa

    Tests with our Live Classes

Education Consultation

Starting your education journey in a new country is difficult. But our study consultants in Islamabad will help you out through each detail. Our friendly counsellors are here to help you choose the courses according to your preferences.

Admission process

Once we know what you want, we'll help you pick the right universities and courses. Doing paperwork might seem a bit tricky, but with EduCrest Hub, it's easy. Our study abroad consultants in Pakistan will make sure everything is stress-free.

Getting Your Visa

The last step is getting your visa and getting ready to leave. It might sound tricky, but expert consultants make it easy from application to processing. Our experts will help you get everything you need and show you how to get your visa.

Our Special Help Package

We will help you find the best option according to your preferences. From giving advice for choosing the best option to helping you with papers and getting your visa, we're here for you. Our best education consultants also guide you in application process. If you also dream of studying in the world’s safest country, EduCrest Hub is here to help. Get in touch and get ready to pack for the best place for your career dreams.

  • Document Check
  • Application Process
  • Assistance With Medicals
  • Visa     Processing
  • Language Coaching

Top Universities in Malaysia

Malaysia is a top educational destination when it comes to studying abroad. Its innovative landscape and ever-evolving academic excellence attract many international students to study in Malaysia. The research works, campus life and world-class education cater to your academic interests and help achieve broader factors. The best thing about Malaysia is its affordable fee structure and living. The food and travelling expenses are low, and you can explore the diversity of culture, beautiful landscapes, and impressive life. Besides, EduCrest Hub offers the best education consultants in Islamabad, which will help you throughout the process. The central Malaysian universities you can study at include:

Best Universities to Study in Malaysia with EduCrest HUB
UniversityGlobal Ranking (by QS WUR)Specialty
City University Malaysia481Best university in Malaysia for degree programs in science, business, health, architecture, communication and management, hospitality, and more!
University of CyberJaya#501-550A world-known university with a track record of global excellence. Some major courses offered by CyberJaya include business and technology, allied health science, psychology and social science, creative arts and design.
UCSI University Malaysia300World known university to study in Malaysia for social sciences, medical and health, applied sciences, education, technology, engineering, and more!
UNIRAZAK Malaysia591-600Best for education, sport sciences, business, management, accounting, economics, and business administration. However, it is widely known for management sciences.
Segi University and College#301-350Best university for business accounting and management, communication and creative design, engineering, information technology, education, and research.
A.P.U University Malaysia#621-630One of the top universities of the world specializing in engineering, IT, mass communication, design, accounting, business management, and more! You can get dual degrees from this university (one from DeMontfort University UK, while the other from APU).
Lincoln University Malaysia351Best university in Malaysia for degree programs in science, arts, farming, law, journalism, accounting, medical, and more!
Universiti Putra Malaysia158A leading university with a track record of global excellence. Some major courses offered by UPM include agriculture, architecture, medicine, and literature.
Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM)188One of Malaysia’s top-ranked universities offering courses in engineering, technology, science, architecture, business, and computing.
Universiti Malaya (UM)65Malaysia’s highest-ranked university offering diverse programs in business, medicine, engineering, law, computer science, and social sciences.
Taylor’s University284Highly reputed for its hospitality, culinary arts, business, communication, engineering, and architecture programs.
Sunway University601-650Offers excellent programs in business, finance, actuarial science, hospitality, psychology, and arts.
Monash University Malaysia57A top global university offering courses in medicine, engineering, business, IT, and social sciences.
Heriot-Watt University Malaysia235Specializes in engineering, construction, business, and actuarial science programs.
INTI International University651-700Best for IT, business, engineering, hospitality, and communication programs.
